website_summaries.verdict: An eco-friendly outdoor broom that works well on tough debris. A small innovation makes a big difference with this one.
pros: O-Cedar uses Maxi-Lok technology and an anti-rotation socket to stabilize the joint between the handle and broom head
Works great for gravel, mulch, sticks, and leaves
cons: Some find it easier to pull debris rather than push it due to the angle of the handle

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Do not, I repeat to you do not waste any money on this. While the broom itself is durable and good quality the handle is absolutely garbage. Mine broke after 2 days of sweeping my back patio. Mind you I was sweeping leaves not industrial construction materials. Friggin leaves! Do not buy this broom.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 1st use
customer_reviews.text: The broom broke on my first use. A waste of money as it is poorly constructed. Cheap plastic and not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!
customer_reviews.text: I got this broom specifically to sweep pea gravel off my driveway. The broom I had was too wide and too hard for me to push. This broom works GREAT. It's not too hard to push, which makes it very enjoyable for me to use. It does a really good job of sweeping on cement, which is exactly what I wanted it for. It's very amusing when it arrives in a really long, narrow amazon box at the door. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bartee

customer_reviews.title: I searched far and wide for a great outdoor/shop broom and this stood out at me the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm digging this broom. I needed one to clean up my back yard, because I broke my kitchen broom trying to use it outdoors. Silly me, I know. Using a smaller kitchen broom on a concrete patio - it never stood a chance. This guy on the other hand, handles it without any hiccups. I searched far and wide for a great outdoor/shop broom and this stood out at me the most. It's a great product and I honestly think it will hold up very well in the long run. Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pine needles.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the broom does not work good for pine needles. The bristles are just the right density that the pine needles not only stick but get wedged in very tight.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We own a restaurant and I bought 3 of these brooms. The first handle bent the first day. The second and third handles bent on the third and fourth day. The brooms work well, but are not strong enough to use for aggressive cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take care of my concrete deck, which is recently buried under water, leaves and other debris. This great broom gets the job done. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: skylight

customer_reviews.title: always wonder how broom folks might make a street broom that does not load up with usual crap, pine needles and the like
customer_reviews.text: I think much nicer joint for handle attachment. We shall see how it holds up, always wonder how broom folks might make a street broom that does not load up with usual crap, pine needles and the like. I guess easy enough to just rub that out but...broom seems pretty robust overall and no worry about typical wood rot if left outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how on earth this broom has such a high rating. In 10min of use, the hollow aluminum pole bent 90degrees. Here’s a pick. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: It's a broom, it does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: How do you rate a broom? It sweeps. The handle is nice and long, but not too long to make it unwieldy. It doesn't lose bristles. The brush head cleans easily with water. We use it in the garage (which my husband also uses as a shop and it picks up sawdust well). The size is nice--not the big professional janitorial size, but much larger than a regular house broom, As I said, it works.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great broom for cleaning my patio!
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and gets the job done. I purchased because after it rains my patio gets covered with dirt and mud. This broom is perfect for cleaning the moist dirt and of course useful for many other purposes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Charnis

customer_reviews.title: It works but is cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: If it's not for work then it'll be fine but it is flimsy, comes loose, and the pole will probably break quick. It's cheap but if you're doing outdoor work look at a worksite first... Those wood brooms are 10x better since plastic degrades. Not sending it back because that's a waste of carbon
customer_reviews.author: Genericusername

customer_reviews.title: doubles as a scrubber!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to brush/scrub off dirt from my concrete patio and entryway. I mixed together bleach and water (1:8 ratio) and used it to scrub off all that old dirt that just didn’t come up with any other product I used. but this worked like a charm and my patio/entryway look awesome! Very easy to handle and maneuver too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Very strong/sturdy attachment!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of brooms like this with removable heads and very cheaply attached. This has a VERY sturdy screw attachment for the 2 pieces! Not scared they'll detach at all until I want them to!
customer_reviews.author: "Mr. T."

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bristles, terrible handle
customer_reviews.text: Has fabulous bristles that can really sweep away the dirt and debris, however the handle is extremely fragile and will bend in half easily. Used daily, broke within a few months. 2 stars due to poor durability and unique handle to brush attachment.
customer_reviews.author: J1mbo Jon3s

customer_reviews.title: Rough and tough but wavy bristles cause things to stick.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to loosen flaking paint on my porch. It is very sturdy and the bristles are tough and rough enough to the job. But as a broom, it’s not ideal. the waviness of the bristles cause things to get caught in there, so if there’s stringy things like hay and horse hair, you end up having to pull them out of the broom.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Snoreck

customer_reviews.title: Professional Street Broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom is heavy duty for industrial use. I thought it would be great for sweeping my driveway, sidewalks and gutters. It does a good job, but the bristles are quite stiff making its use a bit awkward. I believe it will improve with use tho. I know it will last & last & last.
customer_reviews.author: Henry C Brown

customer_reviews.title: but a nice Broom.
customer_reviews.text: Works well . The Knob must be continually tighten as it get lose , but a nice Broom .
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Churchwell

customer_reviews.title: This broom works very well on my outdoor patio surfaces ...
customer_reviews.text: This broom works very well on my outdoor patio surfaces; my only complaint is that the brush head occasionally becomes detached when in use. It is a simple screw on mechanism which does not lock.
customer_reviews.author: EKMorton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, hard bristles, clears debris easily
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Nice and sturdy with good hard bristles. Good for brushing down my concrete patio and drive-way areas. Clears a lot of debris easily. Looks like it will last longer than my previous broom too.
customer_reviews.author: Toria Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Really gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I have been tearing my hair out finding a way to sweep my highly-textured concrete deck. Nothing seems to pick up every tidbit down there, and if I use any force, I end up damaging the broom. This one really does the job on that challenging surface.
customer_reviews.author: lidlone

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, cheap broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom works well and I didn’t pay very much so product value=money. The broom comes loose sometimes so you have to screw it back in a lot. But it does the job and I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy light and fair price
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo 1st floor so a push broom cones in handy once in a while like the front sidewalk or the garage. This is nice and sturdy and light. At 73 it’s probably the last one I’ll need.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell P.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this broom to sweep debris off my back patio. I have huge trees that constantly drop leaves and sticks. So far it has worked incredibly well for me! Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Broke Back Broom
customer_reviews.text: Literally pushing some liquid degreaser around on garage floor, when it bent like 45 degrees. Obviously not as professional as they say it is. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jankowski

customer_reviews.title: Push broom
customer_reviews.text: I found this broom awkward to use. I gave it away
customer_reviews.author: Colorfulspinner

customer_reviews.title: Effective.
customer_reviews.text: The broom was easy to put together. It does take some effort to push it but it is very effective at moving whatever you are trying to sweep. I've used it on my patio and was very impressed with it as it gets the job done a lot quicker than my other broom meant for inside use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Professional Broom!
customer_reviews.text: Great broom. Use it to push the salt and leaves from the building. Strong bristles and easy to clean out. Definitely a good for major jobs. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Broom
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done and makes our 400 sq foot patio a breeze to clean up. I definitely recommend if you’re looking for a cheap and study broom.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Outdoor Broom
customer_reviews.text: What a strong and substantial outdoor broom! I love the thing that tightens down to hold the broom onto the pole--it's guaranteed not to loosen or slip. I imagine I'll use this broom for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: It’s a broom
customer_reviews.text: Was good for about 9 months then rusted and fell apart in a wet patio environment. Lightweight and stiff bristles. I probably needed something made of wood without a metal collar.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The brush part is large, and the handle is long!
customer_reviews.text: I believe that this push broom will do exactly what I need it to do. The brush part is quite large, and the handle is nice and long which will allow me to reach a large area. I believe that I will be very happy with it when I get a chance to really put it to the test!
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: I call him Mr Bristlestick
customer_reviews.text: This fancy gentleman uses his manifold stiff and pointed threads to push dirt, ash, ants, dried blood crumbs, and ham cubes off off surfaces where I don't want them anymore, like cabinet tops, counters, and my prone body. He always does a fine job and keeps up a great attitude, in spite of the disgusting indignities thrust into his luxurious mustache by my repellent hygiene
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Things really stick to it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent quality. It’s hard to push because it sticks to the surface. I have a brick patio. Everything sticks to it. It’s ok. I like the non plastic industrial brooms better
customer_reviews.author: Lori J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Recommend for cement surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Surdy as hell and creates good friction on cement surfaces for a thorough clean. I only use it on cement.
customer_reviews.author: Soffit

customer_reviews.title: Great for rough floor surfaces
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about tis broom. I use it in my basement on concrete floors and it does an amazing job pushing dirt. I am a tall guy (6'3") and the handle is long enough for me to use it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: UGK26

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sweep off the bird mess on my balcony. The floor is textured, so it's hard to sweep with a regular broom. I was impressed at the first push! All the small bird seeds on the floor were pushed away effortlessly. Easy assembly too.
customer_reviews.author: carina

customer_reviews.title: It's a broom!!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great cleaning garage ramp of cinders from street during winter time. What can I say more....this broom is AWESOME!!!! My 5 ft. driveway is much happier now.
customer_reviews.author: Ratherbshooting

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing brush. Bought it because our next door neighbors dogs digs under the fence. Their muddy paws gets on our backyard concrete patio. Used this with floor soap. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Moyin Breuklander

customer_reviews.title: it works perfect and better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: When I took the broom out I was concerned because the width of the broom was small. However after using it, it works perfect and better than I expected. Great product. I was thinking of getting a yard blower but this broom moves everything.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you recognize this is smaller than what you may be used to for garage sweeping. It works. Will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Fleish

customer_reviews.title: O-CEDAR PRO 18" ROUGH-SURFACE PUSH BROOM
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving the product. I used it to sweep away dirt and debris on the street in front of my house and the patio area and walkways. Works wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mira Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Lock Tight Handle, Stiff Bristles - Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and sturdy broom. Stiff bristles perfect for brick walkway. The best part though is the lock tight handle. No more handle twisting loose as you sweep. Hope they make a small size broom the same way for tight spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. It would be nice if the bristles were better at getting into uneven surfaces/cracks
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: This broom works so much better than my natural bristle broom and it seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: This broom works so much better than my natural bristle broom and it seems to hold up a lot better. Could have been packaged in a much smaller box than the one sent.
customer_reviews.author: Mike from NW GA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put it together and to sweep dirt in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Rough and Tough Outside Broom
customer_reviews.text: Bgt this broom for our outside Condo area. Our clean up crew was using an inferior broom and this seems to work much better. Time will tell how this broom holds up. If this broom is anything like the previous reviews I will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean my driveway and it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: stoney

customer_reviews.title: I'd stick to wooden pole/sticks
customer_reviews.text: It was what I needed but overall not what worked. The metal pole bent within a week and broke off sharply soon after.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Brush-head comes unscrewed easily
customer_reviews.text: We were pretty disappointed with this broom. We had high hopes! Biggest disappointment is that the hand never stays screwed tightly into the brush-head. We are constantly having to screw it in tighter. Every few sweeps. Will be buying a new broom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality broom
customer_reviews.text: Just what you'd expect for a high quality, sturdy broom .... use it to .... sweep ... n stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Solid broom, cheap handle.  No replacement
customer_reviews.text: Solid broom for the price. We had the same issue with the handle, bent and broke. Unable to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: P2016

customer_reviews.title: Awesome broom; sometimes lock collar will come loose
customer_reviews.text: Man this is an awesome broom! Would definitely buy again. The grey lock collar has me sold. It does come loose from time to time. I am going to order another at a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: improved broom
customer_reviews.text: nice broom, glad to see someone finally found a way to improve the handle to broom head issues.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for yard work
customer_reviews.text: Great brush... it works great cleaning up all the grass and debris after cutting my grass
customer_reviews.author: Akiaba Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as described and what I intended it to do. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Prizoneroffaith

customer_reviews.title: Very good broom!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice broom. The part that actually locks the broom to the handle is terrific, I am certain this broom will last longer than the others that we had.
customer_reviews.author: Lili P.goodreading

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for garage and back yard (cement) cleaning. It gets used a lot and goes through a lot of abuse but it’s held up well and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: April C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brussels
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful tool and far more easier to assemble than what we used to use in the 90s.
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Well made Broom ....Bristles are a bit Stiff for my Liking
customer_reviews.text: The broom is high quality and works well. The only criticism is that the bristles seem a bit too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Cedarspring

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The broom bristles are firmer than I had hoped. It works fine in the workshop but I wouldn't use it in my home.
customer_reviews.author: H Paul

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you need a strong bristle broom
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these. I store one in my garage and one on my outdoor patio. Highly recommend if you need a strong bristle broom!
customer_reviews.author: skydive99

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design. Tough firm bristles. One pass sweeping and scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction and works very well. Commercial grade broom, something you will not be able to buy at Lowe's or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: dajfed2038

customer_reviews.title: Sweeping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great broom I have an epoxy coated garage floor and this rough surface broom is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: tps

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just received this new push broom. It is lightweight and easy to use. Love how the broom attaches to the pole. Looks like it will take a lot of pressure to come undone. That is the reason I trashed my old one. It just wouldn’t stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broom of Brooms! Built to last and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: nelson watkins

customer_reviews.title: The plastic handle broke within one month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Within one month, the plastic handle broke in half. This was a waste of money. I will see if I can send it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, massive and better than expected. Too much package! Amazon should reduce the boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Velichka

customer_reviews.title: Brush Broom
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's light weight but sturdy and handle stays tightly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tesa M Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Tough but effective
customer_reviews.text: The bristles make it so you need to push pretty hard to use, but I think that’s by design. Sturdy product, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Seaton

customer_reviews.title: good broom
customer_reviews.text: this was good for cleaning up my garage, easy to assemble and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Quite amazed at how lightweight and well built this outdoor broom is. We purchased specifically for outdoor use on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: its pretty light to be handled even by petite people
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a heavy duty broom ! Works perfectly on my patio. Plus, its pretty light to be handled even by petite people. Similar brooms are way expensive in brick and mortar stores. Would definitely recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: Poonam

customer_reviews.title: Does just what I need it to do!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, works great on moving loose gravel off of my driveway!
customer_reviews.author: Val K

customer_reviews.title: Clean swwwp
customer_reviews.text: just the right size to clean a garage! product was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Yarina

customer_reviews.title: Great deck scrubber.
customer_reviews.text: We specifically bought this to scrub our exterior decks. Works great. Any other use I've no idea. None.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Light easy to assemble just a question as to how it holds up over time. Worked fine on its first usage. Thank you for the great product design.
customer_reviews.author: befranck

customer_reviews.title: it brushed me away
customer_reviews.text: Had a very dirty back porch that needed some sweeping and brushed mostly all the dirt off. Now just have some stains left to powerwash.
customer_reviews.author: Last life to live

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to using it to clean my garage and it went great. I even used it to push out water.
customer_reviews.author: Hansa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a stiff broom this is it.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: It's lock in place connection is the best idea for connecting the brush I have seen
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of O-Cedar products this broom holds my expectations. It's lock in place connection is the best idea for connecting the brush I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous broom!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my concrete patio area. Very sturdy, good price and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good broom in most cases
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are a little stiffer than I wanted. Works great on my deck and cement walkways but hard to use on my flagstone walkways (stiff bristles)
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wodei

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice..
customer_reviews.text: this is the broom to sweep up with. Very very nice...Thank YOU
customer_reviews.author: Diana C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. Great for the outdoors. I use it to clean the deck; it works excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping and a very good product. Scrubbed my driveway in no time at ...
customer_reviews.text: as described, fast shipping and a very good product. Scrubbed my driveway in no time at all. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Arrived exactly when said it would.
customer_reviews.author: VMTP

customer_reviews.title: Handle stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy broom is not as heavy as some, so easier to maneuver. Handle/stuck does NOT twist off!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps well.
customer_reviews.text: Very good on hard outdoor surfaces. This did a great job cleaning my outdoor patin of debris.
customer_reviews.author: R. LaPorte

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!
customer_reviews.text: Great broom for our back porch and walkways. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: not too big for storing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stick height and brush head size. Bristles are tough enough to move debris off of concrete effectively.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it says it is. Robust design. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Not all that impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this broom to sweep up debris on my pool decking. I was not impressed with how it worked. It seems almost too light weight and doesn't have enough surface contact. It just kind of swept over the dust and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for use on driveway would recommend for sweeping concrete pads.
customer_reviews.author: Don V vonRentzell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The handle unscrews from the broom head easily. I had to fashion a washer to make it stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Actual broom is good quality but the loosening collar compromises the product
customer_reviews.text: Collar comes loose after pushing broom three or four times. Actual broom is good quality but the loosening collar compromises the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey boy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Broom
customer_reviews.text: Broom was very easy to put together. The handle assembly seems very sturdy. It does a good job sweeping, but the bristles are thick and it can be a little hard to push at first.
customer_reviews.author: Allan B.

customer_reviews.title: A really good broom
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of the attachment of this broom, with the head actually threading onto the handle instead of the handle threading into the head. My only gripe is that the threading that is attached to the broom handle isn't perfect and moves when I use the broom. I tried tightening the small bolt that holds it on. Nothing that some epoxy won't fix, perhaps the manufacturer would do better to epoxy the connection instead of relying on a small bolt? Other than that, a really good product!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mangel

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. I find the screw-on piece connecting the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I find the screw-on piece connecting the brush and the pole comes loose and has to be retightened often.
customer_reviews.author: LMB2009

product_meta.title: O-Cedar Professional 18" Rough-Surface Push Broom
product_meta.description: The ultimate in outdoor push brooms, this rough-surface broom features patented Maxi-Look technology that keeps the broom head secure even during rough use. Its heavy-duty plastic block won't crack, warp or mildew, while the Memory Bristles retain their shape for long-lasting sweeping performance.
feature_bullets: Stiff bristles make this push broom perfect for sweeping rough surfaces
Features Maxi-Lok technology and anti-rotation socket so broom head never comes loose
with broom block and bristles made of 80% recycled material
Works great for garages, sidewalks, decks and other outdoor surfaces
Use & Care Instructions: Shake or rinse broom after each use to remove excess debris. For best results, hang to store. Keep broom fiber away from wall and off the floor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars653 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
